name: AzureLoadTest
description: Automate performance regression testing with Azure Load Testing
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: connectedServiceNameARM
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure Resource Manager subscription to run the load test.

inputs.name: loadTestConfigFile
inputs.label: Load Test File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the YAML file. Should be fully qualified path or relative to the default working directory

inputs.name: resourceGroup
inputs.label: Load Test Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the Azure Resource Group that contains the Load test resource

inputs.name: loadTestResource
inputs.label: Load Test Resource Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the name of an existing Azure Load Testing resource

inputs.name: secrets
inputs.label: Secrets
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Add/Update secret parameters using the json syntax as follows::
[
   {
    "name": "key1",
    "value": $(secret1)
   },
   {
    "name": "key2",
    "value": $(secret2)
   }
]

inputs.name: env
inputs.label: env
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Add/Update environment variables using the json syntax as follows:
[
   {
    "name": "env1",
    "value": "value1"
   },
   {
    "name": "env2",
    "value": "value2"
   }
]
